item.title: Automate SMS and MMS with R, Twilio, Docker, and Github Actions
item.description: Salvador Dali, “The Disintegration of The Persistence of Memory” 1952. Introduction My mother grew up as the youngest of 6 children in Thailand, after her family emigrated from China during the Chinese Civil Wars. While growing up in Bangkok’s Chinatown, my mother learned English from Christian missionaries, and eventually immigrated to the United States. First a devout Buddhist, and later a devout Christian, my mom’s core values have always included love and compassion.
